committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to reauthorize the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore Advisory Commission.

summary.text: Reauthorizes the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore Advisory Commission for an additional ten years. Requires the Secretary of the Interior to consult with the Commission with respect to specified aspects of development of the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore in Michigan.

titles.title: A bill to reauthorize the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore Advisory Commission.
